    • Method Detail

      • setProjectName

      • isLight

        default boolean isLight()

      • getEarlyDisposable

        Disposable getEarlyDisposable()
        Disposable that will be disposed right after container started to be disposed. Use it to dispose something that need to be disposed very early, e.g. Alarm. Or, only and only in unit test mode, if you need to publish something to message bus during dispose.

        In unit test mode light project is not disposed, but this disposable is disposed for each test. So, you don't need to have another disposable and can use this one instead.

        Dependent Disposable.dispose() may be called in any thread. Implementation of Disposable.dispose() must be self-contained and isolated (getting services is forbidden, publishing to message bus is allowed only in tests).
